title: Carbon nanotubes alter agrosystem multifunctionality
content:

DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00195H, Paper
Mathieu Leroy, Vincent E. J. Jassey, Jérôme Silvestre, Maialen Barret, Emmanuel Flahaut, Camille Larue
CNT altered the multifunctionality of agrosystems through both bacterial and plant-based processes impairments.
